name: Room Escape - The Lost Key 5
description:
Welcome to Room Escape - The Lost Key 5, a cool escape game!

Do you think you have the skills with Room Escape - The Lost Key?

It is a perfect day and the sun shines so brightly. Therefore, it is a perfect day to bike in the neighborhood. This weather is so rare in your city so you must take advantage of it. Your gears are ready but you can't leave because you can't open the door. But the worse news is, the key is not on the rack. You must have misplaced it somewhere in the room. You don't want to waste this lovely day so you have to find the lost key. There are clues and traces that can help you to find the key for sure. You just have to explore every corner of your house to find those clues and finally, find the key. You don't want to find it after the sun sets so you have to make it quick.

This is the 5th time that you lost the key and hopefully, this is the last. The Lost Key 5 is the newest room escape game from BAMVD Games. You found the key many times before so you can nail this for sure. You just have to stay focused and use your logic to solve this huge puzzle.

Good luck and have fun!


Game features:

• Genuine story!
• Innovative puzzles!
• Stunning graphics!
• Realistic atmosphere!
• Tricky and challenging puzzles!
• Gorgeous graphics !
• No signup's required, just download and install!

Enjoy this fun adventure escape game!
